gurmukhi: ਕਿੰਚਤ ਕਟਾਛ ਦਿਬਿ ਦੇਹ ਦਿਬਿ ਦ੍ਰਿਸਟਿ ਹੁੲਿ ਦਿਬਿ ਜੋਤਿ ਕੋ ਧਿਅਾਨੁ ਦਿਬਿ ਦ੍ਰਿਸਟਾਤ ਕੈ
transliteration: Kinchat Kataachh Dibi Dayh Dibi Drisati Hui , Dibi Joti Ko Dhiaanu Dibi Drisataat Kai ?
translation: With just a miniscule of clement look of Satguru, the body and looks of a disciple of the Guru become divine. He then starts seeing the presence of the Lord all around him.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਬਿਬੇਕ ਟੇਕ ਪ੍ਰਗਟ ਹੁੲਿ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਅਨਹਦ ਗੰਮਿ ੳੁਨਮਨੀ ਕੋ ਮਤਾਤ ਕੈ
transliteration: Sabad Bibayk Tayk Pragat Hui Gurmati , Anahad Ganmi Ounamanee Ko Mataat Kai ?
translation: By meditating on Gur Shabad (Guru's Word) and taking its refuge, Guru's precepts are revealed to him. When he reaches the state of listening to unstruck melody of the divine word, he enjoys the bliss of higher state of equipoise.

gurmukhi: ਗਿਅਾਨ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਕਰਨੀ ਕੈ ੳੁਪਜਤ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਰਸੁ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਨੇਮ ਨਿਜ ਕ੍ਰਾਤਿ ਕੈ
transliteration: Giaan Dhiaan Karanee Kai Oupajat Praym Rasu , Gurmukhi Soukh Praym Naym Nij Kraati Kai ?
translation: Concentrating on the knowledge of the True Guru, listening to his counsel, practicing contemplation and living life according to His command, a feeling of love grows and blossoms. And in living this life of love, a Guru-conscious person realises the radia

gurmukhi: ਚਰਨ ਕਮਲ ਦਲ ਸੰਪਟ ਮਧੁਪ ਗਤਿ ਸਹਜ ਸਮਾਧਿ ਮਧ ਪਾਨ ਪ੍ਰਾਨ ਸਾਂਤਿ ਕੈ ||੪੩||
transliteration: Charan Kamal Dal Sanpat Madhoup Gati , Sahaj Samaadhi Madh Paan Praan Saanti Kai ?43?
translation: As the bumble bee attains the divine bliss by drinking the elixir and getting shut in the box-like petals of a lotus flower, similarly in order to provide spiritual peace to his life, a true seeker enjoins the lotus-like feet of Guru and drinks deep by co
